introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.body: CV Pro ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our CV generation service.

dataCollected.title: 3. Personal Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following categories of personal data:

personal.label: Personal Information:
personal.text: Name, email address, phone number, address, LinkedIn/GitHub profiles, website, professional summary, photo

professional.label: Professional Data:
professional.text: Work experience, education, skills, job titles, company names, employment dates

technical.label: Technical Data:
technical.text: IP address, browser type, device information, usage analytics

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

contract.label: Contract:
contract.text: To provide CV generation and related services

consent.label: Consent:
consent.text: For non-essential features like analytics and marketing

legitimate.label: Legitimate Interest:
legitimate.text: To improve our services and ensure security

legal.label: Legal Obligation:
legal.text: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

items.coverLetters: Generate tailored cover letters using AI
items.storeProfile: Store your profile data for future use
items.analytics: Analyze service usage to improve functionality
items.security: Ensure platform security and prevent fraud

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.intro: We may share your data with:

ai.label: AI Service Providers:
ai.text: For CV tailoring and cover letter generation (data processed securely and not stored)

dataSharing.noSell: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.intro: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Typically:

items.cv: CV and profile data: Until you delete your account
items.account: Account data: For the duration of your account plus 3 years for legal compliance

gdprRights.title: 8. Your GDPR Rights
gdprRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.label: Right to Access:
access.text: Request a copy of your personal data

erasure.label: Right to Erasure:
erasure.text: Delete your personal data ("right to be forgotten")

restriction.label: Right to Restriction:
restriction.text: Limit how we process your data

portability.label: Right to Portability:
portability.text: Receive your data in a portable format

object.label: Right to Object:
object.text: Object to processing based on legitimate interests

gdprRights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at {{email}}

cookies.title: 9. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.body: We use cookies for essential functionality and, with your consent, for analytics. You can manage your cookie preferences through the consent banner or your browser settings.

security.title: 10. Data Security
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:

items.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
items.euDataCenters: Secure data centers in the EU

international.title: 11. International Data Transfers
international.body: Your data is stored and processed within the European Union. Any transfers outside the EU are conducted with appropriate safeguards in place.

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
changes.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes via email or through our platform.

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at {{email}}:
